job.title: Data Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Staffing and Recruiting,Financial Services
job.description: Data Engineer with C++ and Python<br>Fulltime/Perm opportunity<br>Location: Wayne, PA (2 days a week on site once covid clears)<br><br>Solid python, C++ and sequel. C++ legacy code.<br><br>Engineering side of data, not analyst.<br><br>Remote to start but eventually would be in office, could be combo home and office.<br><br>Join a team of financial software specialists responsible for the acquisition and management of financial market and related data required for research implementation of systematic trading strategies.<br><br><strong><u>Primary Responsibilities<br></u></strong><ul> <li>Implement robust solutions for adoption, storage and management of large volumes of data</li> <li>Develop quality assurance systems in support of high integrity data sets</li> <li>Assist quantitative analysts in crafting custom, bespoke data sets</li> <li>Support timely and fault tolerant data systems in support of production trading algorithms</li> <li>Meet tight deadlines in an efficient manner</li> <br><br></ul><strong><u>Requirements Of The Candidate Include<br></u></strong><ul> <li>Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or applicable degree and very strong exposure to programming and computer systems</li> <li>Experience with Python and C++</li> <li>Experience with data storage and manipulation using approaches such as HDF5, Pandas, and RDBMS/SQL</li> <li>2+ years professional experience in data management role</li> <li>The desire to work in a fast-paced, hardworking and committed environment with a talented team</li> <li>Strong problem solving skills, critical thinking and clear written and verbal communications</li> <li>Financial industry, market data and cloud data environment experience are beneficial</li> </ul> #Dice-SPG
